name: Jumper Polar Bear Free - A Endless Arcade Crossy Road Game
name_original: Jumper Polar Bear Free - A Endless Arcade Crossy Road Game
description:
Jumper Polar Bear is a endless arcade crossy road game, tap arrows buttons to reach the other side of the river before the time expires. to complete a level, you have to put a bear on each of the 5 coves. Don't get driven over by obstacles along the jungle, use the floating ice block or turtle shells to cross the river, if you catch a fish, you get extra points.

Features:

- Endless levels

- Fun easy to play

- Addictive game play

Download it now! FREE!
